nars.util.kif

Class KIF

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.util.kif.KIF

  • public class KIF
extends java.lang.Object
    A class designed to read a file in SUO-KIF format into memory. See for a language specification. readFile() and writeFile() and the only public methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Formula>> formulas
      A HashMap of ArrayLists of Formulas.
      java.util.LinkedHashSet formulaSet
      A "raw" HashSet of unique Strings which are the formulas from the file without any further processing, in the order which they appear in the file.
      static int NORMAL_PARSE_MODE
      A numeric constant denoting normal parse mode, in which syntax constraints are enforced.
      static int RELAXED_PARSE_MODE
      A numeric constant denoting relaxed parse mode, in which fewer syntax constraints are enforced than in NORMAL_PARSE_MODE.
      java.util.TreeSet terms
      The set of all terms in the knowledge base.

      • NORMAL_PARSE_MODE

        public static final int NORMAL_PARSE_MODE
        A numeric constant denoting normal parse mode, in which syntax constraints are enforced.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RELAXED_PARSE_MODE

        public static final int RELAXED_PARSE_MODE
        A numeric constant denoting relaxed parse mode, in which fewer syntax constraints are enforced than in NORMAL_PARSE_MODE.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • terms

        public java.util.TreeSet terms
        The set of all terms in the knowledge base. This is a set of Strings.

      • formulas

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Formula>> formulas
        A HashMap of ArrayLists of Formulas. @see KIF.createKey for key format.

      • formulaSet

        public java.util.LinkedHashSet formulaSet
        A "raw" HashSet of unique Strings which are the formulas from the file without any further processing, in the order which they appear in the file.

        public void setParseMode(int mode)
        Sets the current parse mode to the input value mode.

        mode - An integer value denoting a parsing mode.

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()

      • setupStreamTokenizer

        public static void setupStreamTokenizer(StreamTokenizer_s st)
        This routine sets up the StreamTokenizer_s so that it parses SUO-KIF. = < > are treated as word characters, as are normal alphanumerics. ; is the line comment character and " is the quote character.

      • readFile

        public void readFile(java.lang.String fname)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Read a KIF file.
        Parameters:
        fname - - the full pathname of the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(java.lang.String fname)
        Write a KIF file.
        Parameters:
        fname - - the name of the file to write, including full path.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Test method for this class. Currently, it writes the TPTP output to a file.

        java.io.IOException
